statements.statement:
WITH TMP_実績一覧 AS ( SELECT Z.MS_S_PATAN, Z.MS_IDNO, Z.MS_SIJI_LVL, NVL(S1.MS_YYMM_NO,NVL(S2.MS_YYMM_NO,S3.MS_YYMM_NO)) MS_YYMM_NO, S4.MS_YYMM_NO 確定月度連番, NVL(S1.MS_KAN_YYMMDD,NVL(S2.MS_KAN_YYMMDD,S3.MS_KAN_YYMMDD)) MS_KAN_YYMMDD, NVL(S1.MS_K_PATAN,NVL(S2.MS_K_PATAN,S3.MS_K_PATAN)) MS_K_PATAN, NVL(S1.MS_B_KATA_C,NVL(S2.MS_B_KATA_C,S3.MS_B_KATA_C)) MS_B_KATA_C, NVL(S1.MS_B_KUNI_C,NVL(S2.MS_B_KUNI_C,S3.MS_B_KUNI_C)) MS_B_KUNI_C, NVL(S1.MS_B_KATA_N,NVL(S2.MS_B_KATA_N,S3.MS_B_KATA_N)) MS_B_KATA_N, NVL(S1.MS_KIBAN,NVL(S2.MS_KIBAN,S3.MS_KIBAN)) MS_KIBAN, NVL(S1.MS_TOKKIJIKOU,NVL(S2.MS_TOKKIJIKOU,S3.MS_TOKKIJIKOU)) MS_TOKKIJIKOU, Z.MS_J_TUKINO, Z.MS_JITU_YMD, S1.MS_E_KATA_C, S1.MS_E_KATA_N, Z.MS_ENG_IDNO, Z.MS_ENG_KIBAN, R.RANK FROM MS_ZISEKI Z LEFT JOIN MS_SAGYO S1 ON (S1.MS_SIJI_LVL = '1' AND S1.MS_IDNO = Z.MS_IDNO) LEFT JOIN MS_SAGYO S2 ON (S2.MS_SIJI_LVL = '3' AND S2.MS_IDNO = Z.MS_IDNO) LEFT JOIN MS_SAGYO S3 ON (S3.MS_SIJI_LVL = '7' AND S3.MS_IDNO = Z.MS_IDNO) LEFT JOIN MS_SAGYO S4 ON (S4.MS_SIJI_LVL = '2' AND S4.MS_IDNO = Z.MS_IDNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT K.RANK, S.MS_IDNO FROM TBL_AP型式情報M K INNER JOIN MS_SAGYO S ON (K.PRO_CODE = S.MS_B_KATA_C AND K.COUNTRY = S.MS_B_KUNI_C)) R ON (R.MS_IDNO = Z.MS_IDNO) WHERE Z.MS_STATION = #station#
TO_CHAR(Z.MS_JITU_YMD,'YYYY/MM/DD') = #jissekiYMD#
TO_CHAR(Z.MS_JITU_YMD,'YYYY/MM/DD') > '1970/01/01'
), TMP_検索対象 AS ( SELECT MS_IDNO, MS_SIJI_LVL, MS_YYMM_NO, 確定月度連番, MS_KAN_YYMMDD, MS_K_PATAN, MS_B_KATA_C, MS_B_KUNI_C, MS_B_KATA_N, CASE WHEN MS_S_PATAN='10' THEN SUBSTR(PKG_COM_E7.Get_Plant_Code(MS_B_KATA_C, MS_KIBAN)||MS_KIBAN,1,7) ELSE MS_KIBAN END MS_KIBAN, MS_TOKKIJIKOU, MS_J_TUKINO, MS_JITU_YMD, MS_E_KATA_C, MS_E_KATA_N, MS_ENG_IDNO, CASE WHEN MS_S_PATAN='30' THEN SUBSTR(PKG_COM_E7.Get_Plant_Code(MS_E_KATA_C, MS_ENG_KIBAN)||MS_ENG_KIBAN,1,7) ELSE MS_ENG_KIBAN END MS_ENG_KIBAN, RANK FROM TMP_実績一覧 ) SELECT TMP2.*, CASE WHEN MS_YYMM_NO < ( SELECT MAX(MS_YYMM_NO) FROM TMP_検索対象 TMP1 WHERE TMP1.MS_JITU_YMD < TMP2.MS_JITU_YMD ) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS 直通 FROM TMP_検索対象 TMP2
MS_KIBAN LIKE '%$kiban$%'
MS_IDNO = '$idno$'
MS_B_KATA_C LIKE '$katashikiCode$%'
MS_B_KUNI_C LIKE '$kuniCode$%'
MS_B_KATA_N LIKE '$katashikiName$%'
MS_TOKKIJIKOU LIKE '%$tokki$%'
ORDER BY MS_J_TUKINO
